name: Elenore Vance
description: The walls appear to be 'breathing' and loud pounding sounds are coming from the hallway. No physical source found.

name: Newt Scamander
description: Small, platypus-like creature escaped. Last seen attempting to crawl into a vault. High affinity for gold.

name: Fox Mulder
description: Bright white light stalled the car engine. Observed a metallic craft hovering silently. I want to believe.

name: Lorraine Warren
description: A porcelain doll named Annabelle keeps moving locations on its own. It has begun writing messages on parchment.

name: Samwise Gamge
description: Encountered a massive, ancient spider. It seems to have been there for ages. Very dangerous.

name: Arthur Frayn
description: Observed a massive floating stone head known as Zardoz. Reality seems to be fracturing into digital fragments.

name: Gerry Lane
description: Massive group of unidentified humanoids climbing walls with incredible speed. Highly aggressive.

name: Danny Torrance
description: Saw two twin girls in the hallway. They asked me to play with them forever. Redrum written on the door.

name: Ash Williams
description: Found a book bound in human skin. After reading a passage, the trees outside started moving. Groovy.

name: Thomas Anderson
description: Saw a black cat walk by twice. Exactly the same way both times. Deja vu. A glitch in the system.
